EmailTemplate.name: Notification of training booking received (S/AMs)
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for booking your training date
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network / Society
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
This is to confirm that we have received your training booking. We will send you a confirmation email of the date, time and venue in due course.
We look forward to seeing you again!
Best wishes,
The Challenge Society e: associate.mentors@the-challenge.org www.thechallengesociety.org
